short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An AI-powered helper to personalize your LinkedIn outreach to tech candidates and build your talent pipeline

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
As you're visiting a candidate's LinkedIn profile, this assistant will get all the professional and personal information from LinkedIn (and elsewhere), and write a personalized message for you!

Then the assistant will paste the message in to the message field - the message won't be sent until you hit send, so you can edit as much as you want.
